channel.title: Skill Levels
channel.description:
Is there a way to change how fast the skills go up?
Because on most server's it's too fast so they don't play very long... they get 99 everything and then leave...
I wanted to make it about double maybe triple the actual runescape speed. Can I do this with the coding?

item.title: Skill Levels
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Master Noob Master
item.description:
@Noob_Master wrote:

Ok thanks

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Noob Master, post:1, topic:286304”]Is there a way to change how fast the skills go up?

Because on most server’s it’s too fast so they don’t play very long… they get 99 everything and then leave…

I wanted to make it about double maybe triple the actual runescape speed. Can I do this with the coding?[/quote]

Find the exp rates in client.java and change them…

Read full topic
